title: Bad Elements: Blood for Blood
description: Crystal Bouchard, known as Crystal Dragon in the underground fighting circuit, is re-united with her family after spending five years imprisoned as a fighter for the vampire/werewolf community.  As her familial ties are woven, Crystal's former kidnapper, vampire Jace Templeton and his henchmen seek revenge on her, forcing her to make a decision that could kill her and her family. Only this time she brings a new breed to the fight.
author: Lynn Mullican
